titles: A treatise conteyning the true catholike and apostolike faith of the holy sacrifice and sacrament ordeyned by Christ at his last Supper vvith a declaration of the Berengarian heresie renewed in our age: and an answere to certain sermons made by M. Robert Bruce minister of Edinburgh concerning this matter. By VVilliam Reynolde priest.
author: Rainolds, William, 1544?-1594.
notes: A reply to: Bruce, Robert.  Sermons upon the sacrament of the Lords Supper.
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Bruce, Robert, 1554-1631. --  Sermons upon the sacrament of the Lords Supper --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Protestantism --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
